chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 mini is experiencing the following issue:

A white line appeared on the right side of my screen, and a few days later, the left side of my touch screen stopped working. 
Additionally, the volume buttons on my phone are malfunctioning: it's very difficult to press them.

Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile

The customer sent this request:

A white line appeared on the right-hand side of my screen, then a few days later the touchscreen on the left-hand side of my screen stopped working.

What's more, the volume buttons on my phone don't work properly: it's very difficult to press them.

We have shared you some images of the product, give us an answer as soon as possible.

Regards,
Herve from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Can you help relay this message to the customer. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused. Would the customer accept a commercial gesture of 20 euros to avoid the hassle of returning the phone? With this commercial gesture the customer can use this amount to fund and offset the cost of repairing the screen at their neighborhood mobile repair shop. It also avoids the hassle of deleting all personal data when returning the phone and saves the harmful carbon dioxide emissions generated by logistics carriers when transporting the device back to our facility.

Regards,
CH

Dear ecomobile

We have received your message of refunding the customer 20 € to repair the screen.

But remind yourself that an openning by a third person is exclude from warranty.

We are waiting for your answer about that.

Regards,
Herve from the Back Care Team

Dear ecomobile

We are still waiting for your response about the customer's request.

Regards,
Herve from the Back Care Team

Dear backcare, 

please relay the following message to the customer.

If the customer decides to repair the phone at another repair shop, it will be excluded from warranty, we are sorry for this inconvenience caused. 

Occasionally, the issue could be due to a system glitch. Please attempt to force reset the device. Alternatively if it is indeed a hardware issue, would you accept a commercial gesture of 100 euros instead?

Thank you 
Regards, 
JH

Hello Elise, You will find the prepaid return label attached. Chronopost will take care of your return. Choose the location that best suits you to send your package. You will find a list of drop-off locations here: https://www.pickup.fr/trouver-un-point/. Return preparation: 1. See instructions for returning an item here 2. Add all accessories provided with your item 3. Remove any protection, case, and screen protector 4. Package your item and its accessories according to the instructions below. Package instructions: • The box must be sturdy and rigid. Place your item so that it is stable and does not move during transport. • Attach the return label on top of the box. You can also place an additional label inside in case the external label is damaged. • Take photos of the inside and outside of the package before sending it. This will protect you in case of a problem during transport. Your return is ready to send! We'll let you know when it arrives. We're at your service, Back Market Customer Service, Back Market Customer Service

Bonjour,

Le vendeur n'est pas en mesure de traiter le retour en raison du problème suivant :
L’article est verrouillé sur iCloud ou Google.
Plus de détails ont été ajoutés dans le message suivant : Dear Backcare,

It has come to our attention that the device is locked with the customer's iCloud account, hence we are unable to proceed. We require the customer to unlink their iCloud account from the phone.
Kindly request the customer's help to resolve this issue. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
AS

Dear ecomobile

The customer has disconnected the account, proceed with the repair as soon as possible.

Regards,
Herve from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Thank you for your assistance, we will proceed with the repair now.

Regards,
JY

Bonjour,

Le vendeur n'est pas en mesure de traiter le retour en raison du problème suivant :
L'article est hors garantie.
Plus de détails ont été ajoutés dans le message suivant : Dear Backcare,

As seen in the photo, the phone has a bad dent at the bottom left corner of the device. The phone was sent in EXCELLENT condition which means that there were no dents or scratches on the phone. The customer had the device for almost 3 months before complaining of the LCD issue. However, on closer inspection, we found that the phone now has a dent that is caused by a drop. As such, the phone is out of warranty. we will be sending the device back to the customer, please confirm the customers address as : 

Elise Gimond
4 chemin de Lacroux
81190 Tanus
France
06 11 76 58 18

Regards,
RK

Dear Backcare,

As mentioned, the device has a dent that was not there when we sent it to the customer. The customer had the phone for months and now there is a dent on the bottom corner of the phone. This is likely caused by a large impact (such as a drop) which could have affected the phone's functionaility. The customer is now complaining that their phone is facing LCD issues which is most likely caused by the drop. As such, this device is out of warranty. Please relook into this case.

Regards,
RK

Hi ecomobile,

The decision of our technical team is irrevocable.

Thank you for taking charge of the repair of the product otherwise, we will refund the order.

Sincerely,
Jihy-Jania, customer service Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, we are unable to repair the device and we do not have enough stock to process an exchange. Therefore, we will be offering a refund instead. However, the device was purchased as an EXCELLENT condition. According to the Quality Charter, EXCELLENT condition requires the device to be free of scratches and dents. The customer has had the device for a certain amount of time. This suggests that he was satisfied with the device condition upon receipt.

Now that the device has dents upon return, the grade is degraded to a FAIR condition.

Hence, a 60 euros deduction is reasonable which indicates that the customer receives a partial refund of  euros. Please check with the customer and get back to me. 

Thank you.

Regards,
AS
